=====================================

### 6D063-226247 Genetic Analyzer System - 2

#### Reference Number
WS4038438417-Doc4128544007

#### Solicitation Number
WS4038438417

#### Publication Date
2023-08-03

#### Tender Closing Date
2023-08-25T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

#### Amendment Number
2

#### Amendment Date
2023-08-08

### Description
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a supplier to provide, deliver, and train for one new Genetic Analyzer System in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

#### Contract Term
The contract term is not specified, but the tender proposal response deadline is [August 25, 2023] at 14:00 EDT. Please note that bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive.

#### Procurement Details
*     Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
*     Selection Criteria: Lowest price
*     Notice type: Request for Proposal
*     Trade Agreements:
    *     Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *     Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *     Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *     Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *     Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *     Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *     Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *     Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *     World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Contact Information
For more information or to access the tender notice and Associated Documents, please visit:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17055291?extsite=MTcwNTUyOTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

You can contact Sallie Boutin from the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) at:

sallie.boutin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Goods and Services Classification
*     Physical Location: Winnipeg, MB
*     UNSPSC Classification Code: 41100000
*     UNSPSC Description: Laboratory and scientific equipment

Note to Vendors:
Requests for Clarification will be answered through the posting on Ariba. We discourage online queries. Please check the above website for clarification on all matters related to the tender
